column4: When I try to use usb-creator.exe from the maverick ISO in Windows to install Ubuntu onto an NTFS flash drive, I get a "failed to install bootloader" error.
did you MD5 test the ISO you downloaded?
No; I got it from bittorrent.
still worth an md5 test, also check the health of the device too. You can use the 1 2 3 installer from pendrive linux too to put the ISO onto the USB
